item.title: 5 Fastest Growing Green Jobs To Watch In The Next Decade
item.description: List of the fastest growing green jobs that will continue to grow over the next ten years. The BLS lists a mix of skilled and unskilled roles.

item.title: This Weekend Sees The Year’s Second And Final Solar Eclipse
item.description: Everything you need to know about the Sept. 21/22, 2025, partial solar eclipse from New Zealand, Antarctica and the South Pacific.
